order.paymentMessage: It looks like your order hasn’t been paid yet. Please complete the payment soon to avoid any delays in processing.

order.requestCancelOrderDescription: Since the order is being prepared, this request will need to be reviewed before cancellation. Clicking "Confirm" button means submitting a request to cancel all items in this order. This action cannot be undone. Promotional codes (if any) can still be applied to other orders after canceling this one.

cancelOrderReason.productChange: Change in product details (color, size, quantity)

cancelOrderReasonByAdmin.sellerRestricted: Seller account is suspended or restricted.
cancelOrderReasonByAdmin.systemError: System error in processing the order.

order.cancelRequestPendingMessage: Your cancellation request has been submitted and is awaiting confirmation. The order will remain active until the brand reviews and approves the request. If your request is approved, we will process a refund (if applicable).
order.cancelRequestRejectedMessage: Your cancellation request has been rejected. The order will continue to be processed as usual. You can click "Return order" after receiving the item if needed. Please contact customer support if you need further assistance.

statusDescription.joinGroupBuying: The customer has joined a group-buying deal. The order will be processed once the required number of participants is reached.
statusDescription.pending: The order has been placed but is awaiting payment. The customer needs to complete the payment to proceed.
statusDescription.waitConfirm: The order is awaiting confirmation from the seller.
statusDescription.shipping: The order is packed and ready for shipment. Awaiting carrier pickup.
statusDescription.preparingOrder: The order has been confirmed, and the warehouse is currently processing and packing the items.
statusDescription.delivering: The order has been shipped and is in transit to the customer.
statusDescription.delivered: The order has been successfully delivered to the customer's address.
statusDescription.completed: The customer has confirmed receipt of the order, and the transaction is finalized.
statusDescription.cancelled: The refund has been processed and issued to the customer.
statusDescription.returning: The customer has requested a return, and the order is in the process of being returned to the seller.
statusDescription.refunded: The order has been canceled and will not be processed or shipped.
statusDescription.brandReceived: The returned order has been successfully received by the brand. The return process is awaiting further review. If the brand does not file a complaint, the coins will be refunded to the customer's wallet within {{count}} days. If the brand files a complaint, the support team will review and resolve the issue.
statusDescription.returnFailed: The return process was unsuccessful due to issues such as incorrect return shipment, damaged item upon return, or failure to meet return conditions. Further action may be required.

order.CancelOrderRequestBrandMessage: The customer has requested to cancel the order. Please review and make a decision. You can approve the cancellation or reject it to proceed with the order.
order.approvedCancelRequest: Cancellation approved. Order is now canceled.

returnOrderDialog.title: Return Order Request
returnOrderDialog.description: By clicking 'Request Return,' you agree to return all items in this order. Once approved, this action cannot be undone.
returnOrderDialog.successDescription: We will process your request within the next {{count}} days and notify you of the results as soon as possible. Thank you for trusting our service.
returnOrderDialog.mediaFilesNotes: Please provide clear images and videos that accurately show the product's condition, order ID, and packaging status. A video of the unboxing process is recommended to support the review.

order.returnRequestApprovedMessage: Your return request has been approved. Please prepare and pack the item within {{count}} days. A shipper from our brand will contact you to arrange the pickup. Remember to keep clear photos and videos as proof of the product's condition and packaging.

rejectCancelOrderReason.SHIPPED: The order is in transit and cannot be canceled.
rejectCancelOrderReason.PROCESSED: The order has already been processed and is ready for shipment.
rejectCancelOrderReason.MULTIPLE_ATTEMPTS: Multiple cancellation attempts detected, violating our cancellation policy.
rejectCancelOrderReason.SUSPICIOUS_ACTIVITY: This cancellation request appears to be fraudulent or suspicious.

order.estimatedPriceNote: This is an estimated price, the price may change after the event ends

toast.info: This is a message to provide important additional information related to your work.
toast.warning: You are about to perform a unsafe action, please be cautious. If you are not sure, please contact the support team.

contact.description: We're here to help! Whether you have questions about our beauty consulting services, need support with an order, or are interested in joining our platform as a beauty consultant, our team is ready to assist.

feedback.successDescription: Thank you for your review! Your review helps other customers make informed decisions and supports brands in improving their products.
feedback.successRepDescription: Your response has been successfully submitted. Thank you for addressing customer feedback!
feedback.mediaFilesHint: You are allowed to upload a maximum of {{videoCount}} video(s) and {{imageCount}} image(s), provided that the total file size remains within {{size}}MB. Please ensure your files are in one of the supported formats: {{format}}.

imagesHint.TO_SHIP: Show order contents, packaging, shipping label.
imagesHint.SHIPPING: Provide proof of handing the package to the shipping carrier.
imagesHint.DELIVERED: Show outer package, product inside, any visible damage (if any).
imagesHint.RETURNING: Provide evidence of the return process.
imagesHint.REFUNDED: Upload proof of return completion and refund.

videosHint.TO_SHIP: A 360° view of the package to confirm it's properly sealed.
videosHint.SHIPPING: Record handover moment or a short clip of the sealed package before shipping.
videosHint.DELIVERED: Unboxing video to capture package condition & item accuracy.
videosHint.RETURNING: Record defect/missing parts/issues clearly for verification.
videosHint.REFUNDED: Upload video of return completion and refund.

beautyConsultation.heroDescription: Connect with our professional beauty experts for personalized advice tailored to your unique needs and goals.
beautyConsultation.expertGuidanceDesc: Personalized advice from certified beauty professionals with years of experience.
beautyConsultation.flexibleSchedulingDesc: Book appointments at your convenience, including evenings and weekends.
beautyConsultation.followUpDesc: Continuous support and follow-up consultations to track your progress.
beautyConsultation.ctaDescription: Book a consultation with our beauty experts and discover personalized solutions for your unique beauty needs.
beautyConsultation.faqQuestion1: How do I prepare for my beauty consultation?
beautyConsultation.faqAnswer1: Come with a clean face (for skin consultations), take photos of your current products, and write down any specific concerns or questions you have. This will help our consultants provide the most tailored advice.
beautyConsultation.faqAnswer2: Yes, you can reschedule up to 24 hours before your scheduled appointment without any fee. Cancellations or reschedules with less than 24 hours notice may incur a fee.
beautyConsultation.faqAnswer3: After your consultation, you will receive a detailed summary of recommendations, product suggestions, and a personalized plan via email. Our experts will follow up with you after 2 weeks to check on your progress.
beautyConsultation.standardDescription: Our standard consultation services allow you to fill out detailed questionnaires designed by our experts. Based on your responses, consultants will analyze your needs and provide personalized recommendations through our feedback system.
beautyConsultation.premiumDescription: Our premium service includes everything in the standard package plus a scheduled video call with your consultant. This allows for a more in-depth discussion of your concerns and more personalized guidance tailored to your specific needs.
beautyConsultation.customFeedback: Custom questionnaires, Expert analysis, Detailed feedback
beautyConsultation.premiumFeatures: All standard features, One-on-one video consultation, Follow-up support
beautyConsultation.noServices: No consultation services match your current filters. Please try different criteria.
beautyConsultation.faqQuestion4: What is the difference between Standard and Premium consultations?
beautyConsultation.faqAnswer4: Standard consultations involve filling out detailed questionnaires and receiving expert feedback through our system. Premium consultations include everything in the standard package plus a personalized video call with your consultant for more in-depth guidance and the ability to ask specific questions.
beautyConsultation.faqQuestion5: How long does each consultation typically last?
beautyConsultation.faqAnswer5: Standard form-based consultations take about 15-20 minutes to complete. Premium video consultations are scheduled for 30-60 minutes depending on the service type, allowing for more detailed discussions and personalized demonstrations.
beautyConsultation.faqQuestion6: Can I purchase recommended products after my consultation?
beautyConsultation.faqAnswer6: Yes! After your consultation, you will receive a personalized product recommendation list. You can easily purchase these products directly through our platform with special post-consultation discounts, or use the list for shopping elsewhere.
beautyConsultation.introTitle: Personalized Beauty Advice at Your Fingertips
beautyConsultation.introDescription: Our beauty consultation services connect you with experienced professionals who provide personalized advice and solutions. Whether you need help with skincare, makeup, hair styling, or overall wellness, our experts are here to guide you on your beauty journey.
beautyConsultation.serviceNotFoundDesc: The service you are looking for does not exist or may have been removed.
beautyConsultation.personalizedApproach: 100% personalized approach based on your needs
beautyConsultation.expertGuidance: Guided by leading experts in the field
beautyConsultation.exclusiveProducts: Access to exclusive products at preferential prices
beautyConsultation.commitmentDesc: We are committed to delivering real value with every consultation, or 100% money back.
beautyConsultation.guaranteeDesc: If you are not satisfied with your consultation, we will fully refund or reschedule with another expert.
beautyConsultation.expertCommitmentDesc: I am committed to providing the highest quality consultation service and ensuring customer satisfaction.

productClassification.title: Confirm Changes to Product Classification Attributes
productClassification.description: You are modifying important classification attributes such as color, size, or other factors. To ensure accurate inventory management, ordering, and order processing, the current classification will be deactivated. A new classification will be created with the updated attributes once you submit the form. Are you sure you want to proceed? You can cancel before submitting to retain the current classification. Note: This action cannot be undone after submission.

decisionReturn.description: The customer has requested a return for this order.

viewReturn.title: Confirm Return Decision
viewReturn.description: The customer has submitted a return request for this order.
viewReturn.admin: Admin's Decision on the Brand's Request

decisionRejectReturn.title: Review Return Request Rejection
decisionRejectReturn.description: The brand has rejected the customer's return request. Please review the details of the request and the brand's reason for rejection. You can either approve or reject the rejection. If you reject the request, please provide a reason, the brand and customer will be notified.
decisionRejectReturn.admin: Admin's Decision on the Brand's Request

returnTrackView.title: Return Order Details

returnTrackView.admin: Admin's Decision on the Brand's Request

complaintTrackView.description: Below is the detailed information on the complaint review process.

complaintTrackView.brand: Admin's Decision on the Brand's Complaint

return.returnRequestApprovedView: Your return request has been approved. Press the "View" button to review the processing details.

rejectBrandRejectionReason.validReturnRequest: The customer's return request is valid and meets platform policies
rejectBrandRejectionReason.insufficientJustification: The brand's reason for rejecting the return request is not sufficiently justified
rejectBrandRejectionReason.missingEvidence: The brand did not provide enough evidence to support the rejection
rejectBrandRejectionReason.policyCompliance: The return request aligns with the platform's return policy
rejectBrandRejectionReason.customerProtection: Decision made in favor of customer protection and fair resolution
rejectBrandRejectionReason.escalationRequired: Further escalation or review is needed before rejecting the return request

return.rejectRequestRejectOrderMessage: Pressing 'Confirm' means rejecting the brand's request. The customer will receive a notification to pack and return the item to the brand.
return.returnRequestPendingMessageCustomer: Your return request is being reviewed. We will notify you of the decision within {{string}} days. Please check your notifications for updates.
return.returnRequestRejectedMessageCustomer: Unfortunately, your return request has been rejected. Please check the provided reason in your return details. If you have any questions, feel free to contact our support team.

returnOrderEvidenceDialog.title: Upload Return Shipment Evidence
returnOrderEvidenceDialog.description: Please provide clear proof of your return shipment, including images or videos of the packaged item and the shipping receipt. This helps ensure a smooth return process.
returnOrderEvidenceDialog.mediaFilesNotes: Ensure that your photos or videos clearly show the product's condition, packaging, and shipping label. A video recording of the packing and shipping process is recommended for verification.
returnOrderEvidenceDialog.returnOrderShipmentSuccessMessage: You have successfully submitted your return shipment details. We will review the provided evidence and update you on the next steps. Please keep your shipping receipt and tracking information for reference.

rejectReturnOrderReason.notEligible: The product is not eligible for return
rejectReturnOrderReason.noValidReason: The provided return reason is not valid
rejectReturnOrderReason.insufficientEvidence: Insufficient proof or evidence provided for the claim
rejectReturnOrderReason.policyViolation: The return request violates platform return policy
rejectReturnOrderReason.damagedByCustomer: The product was damaged due to customer misuse
rejectReturnOrderReason.usedOrAltered: The product has been used, or altered from its original state
rejectReturnOrderReason.discountedOrFinalSale: Item is a final sale or non-returnable promotional product

complaintReturnOrderReason.wrongItemReturned: The returned item does not match the original order
complaintReturnOrderReason.usedOrDamaged: The product has been used or is not in its original condition
complaintReturnOrderReason.missingParts: Returned item is missing parts, accessories, or original packaging
complaintReturnOrderReason.fakeOrDifferentProduct: The returned item is counterfeit or different from what was purchased
complaintReturnOrderReason.damagedPackaging: The product packaging is damaged beyond acceptable condition
complaintReturnOrderReason.returnAbuse: Customer has a history of excessive or fraudulent returns
complaintReturnOrderReason.expiredReturn: The return was received after the allowed return period

rejectReturnOrderDialog.title: Reject Return Request
rejectReturnOrderDialog.description: Please provide a valid reason for rejecting this return request. If applicable, attach supporting evidence to justify your decision. This information will be reviewed before finalizing the rejection.
rejectReturnOrderDialog.mediaFilesNotes: Ensure that any uploaded images or videos clearly support your decision, such as product condition, missing packaging, or policy violations.

return.rejectReturnSuccessMessage: You have successfully rejected the return request. Our support team will review this decision and provide you with the final result as soon as possible.
return.rejectReturnRequestPendingMessageBrand: Your request to reject the return is being reviewed by our support team. We will notify you once a final decision is made.
return.rejectReturnRequestApprovedMessageBrand: Your request to reject the return has been approved. The customer will be notified accordingly.
return.rejectReturnRequestRejectedMessageBrand: Your request to reject the return has been denied. The return request will proceed as approved.
return.returnRequestPendingMessageAdmin: The customer has requested a return for this order. The brand will review and decide. You can check the platform's return policy for guidance.
return.successMakeDecisionOnReject: Successfully processed the brand's return rejection request!
return.returnOrderRequestMessage: The brand has declined the customer's return request. Please review all relevant details and platform policies before making a final decision.
return.returnOrderRequestMessageBrand: A customer has requested a return for this order. You can review the request and make a decision. If no action is taken within {{count}} days, the request will be automatically approved. If approved, the customer will proceed with shipping the return. If rejected, the admin will review and make the final decision.
return.complaintRequestApprovedMessageCustomer: The brand has filed a complaint about your return order, and the request has been approved by the admin. You will not receive a coin refund for this order. You can review the complaint details and contact the support team if needed.

rejectCancel.title: Cancel Request Rejected
rejectCancel.message: Please provide a reason for rejecting the request.
